<h3 id="X10884">X(10884)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: CONWAY AND HEXYL</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; (b^2+c^2-a^2)*(a^4-2*(b+c)*a^3-4*a^2*b*c+2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(10884) = (4*R^2+4*R*r+r^2)*X(1)-R*(4*R+r)*X(7)</b>
<p>X(10884) lies on these lines:{1,7}, {2,1490}, {3,63}, {4,5249}, {9,6986}, {21,84}, {33,412}, {40,3868}, {55,9943}, {56,10391}, {57,411}, {73,1040}, {142,6835}, {165,3811}, {226,6836}, {377,515}, {405,971}, {442,5787}, {518,5584}, {572,2172}, {581,5256}, {603,3561}, {631,5720}, {908,6865}, {936,3523}, {938,1467}, {942,7580}, {946,4666}, {950,6925}, {958,5784}, {960,8273}, {993,10085}, {997,5267}, {1006,7330}, {1012,1385}, {1125,6837}, {1212,5781}, {1319,9848}, {1420,7125}, {1621,9961}, {1709,5248}, {1750,3091}, {1765,3294}, {1766,3970}, {1768,9964}, {2478,6260}, {3149,3306}, {3305,5777}, {3338,10122}, {3522,6282}, {3562,7070}, {3601,6909}, {3616,10430}, {3624,6884}, {3651,5709}, {3877,7971}, {3885,7966}, {3911,6962}, {4084,7991}, {4197,5587}, {4512,7992}, {5084,5658}, {5208,10476}, {5219,6943}, {5234,5785}, {5250,6001}, {5436,6912}, {5437,6915}, {5531,9588}, {5534,5657}, {5691,6839}, {5715,6895}, {5768,6734}, {6264,9963}, {6284,7702}, {6705,6910}, {6769,9778}, {6840,9612}, {6906,7171}, {6932,9581}, {6953,9843}, {6985,10202}, {8227,10883}, {9845,9859}, {10461,10882}, {10861,10864}</p>
<p>
X(10884) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,1044,2263), (1,4303,77), (1,5732,20), (63,224,78), (63,4855,1259), (84,3576,21), (936,10857,3523), (1490,8726,2), (3149,9940,3306), (3868,7411,40), (4292,4297,20)<br>
